item.title: CVE-2020-0702|2024-08-04T06:11:05.421Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20surface%20hub
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Surface Hub when prompting for credentials, aka 'Surface Hub Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
